    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1800</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Arv - øyefarge</string>
            <string language="en">heredity-eye colour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vererbung-Auge Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur de hérédité-oeil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor do heredity-olho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colore dell'eredità-occhio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώμα κληρονομικότητα-ματιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">color del herencia-ojo</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Studer hvilken øyefarge barn kommer til å få ut fra øyefarge og anlegg foreldrene har.</string>
            <string language="en">Study what eye colour a child gets on the basis of the parents eyecolour and genes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">arv</string>
            <string language="en">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">øyefarge</string>
            <string language="en">eye colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Sie, welche Auge Farbe ein Kind auf der 
Grundlage von das Elterneyecolour und -gene erhält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiez quelle couleur d'oeil un enfant obtient 
sur la base de l'eyecolour et des gènes de parents.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estude que cor do olho uma criança começa na 
base do eyecolour e dos genes dos pais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi che colore dell'occhio un bambino ottiene in
base al eyecolour ed ai geni dei genitori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μελέτη ποιο μάτι χρωματίζει ένα παιδί παίρνει 
βάσει των γονέων eyecolour και των γονιδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudie qué color del ojo consigue un niño en 
base del eyecolour y de los genes de los padres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">couleur d'oeil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cor do olho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colore dell'occhio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώμα ματιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">heridety</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">color del ojo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
